OAT.trading.thread

Class TradingThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • OAT.event.Listenable
      • OAT.trading.Plugin
        • OAT.trading.thread.BaseThread
          • OAT.trading.thread.DataThread
            • OAT.trading.thread.TradingThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, GenericListener, Loggable, PrefNode<Plugin>, Tabulable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HybridStrategy

    public abstract class TradingThread
extends DataThread
implements Tabulable
    Abstract class for trading and account handling.

    • Field Detail

      • COLUMN_HEADERS

        public static final java.lang.String[] COLUMN_HEADERS

      • p_Active

        protected boolean p_Active
        Active strategy.

      • p_Backtest_Only

        protected boolean p_Backtest_Only
        Backtest only strategy.

      • p_Avoid_Chasing

        protected boolean p_Avoid_Chasing
        Avoid chasing at the same direction of the previous trade.

      • p_Account_Group

        protected java.lang.String p_Account_Group
        Account group for advisor account.

      • p_Default_Qty

        protected int p_Default_Qty
        The default quantity of all trades.

      • p_Max_Limit_Ticks

        protected int p_Max_Limit_Ticks
        To determine the limit price of a new order.

        limit price = order price + side * p_Max_Limit_Ticks * getMinTick()

      • p_Last_Order_Minute

        protected int p_Last_Order_Minute
        Minimum number of minute before market close to enter new position.

      • p_Closing_Minute

        protected int p_Closing_Minute
        Number of minute before market close to kill all positions.

      • p_Max_Stop_Factor

        protected double p_Max_Stop_Factor
        Maximum loss ratio to the last price per trade.

        p_Max_Stop_Factor = max loss / last price

      • p_Max_Daily_Loss_Factor

        protected double p_Max_Daily_Loss_Factor
        Maximum loss ratio to the last price per day.

        p_Max_Daily_Loss_Factor = max day loss / last price

      • p_Max_Consec_Loss

        protected int p_Max_Consec_Loss
        Maximum number of consecutive loss.

      • Trigger_Method

        protected final int Trigger_Method
        Stop order trigger method.

        0=Default, 1=Double_Bid_Ask, 2=Last, 3=Double_Last, 4=Bid_Ask, 7=Last_or_Bid_Ask, 8=Mid-point

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
